> Get together in teams and build a lego structure and document the process as you go. Fun and interactive icebreaker activity to introduce the concept of reproducibility.

## Description
This is an interactive activity where participants have to build a structure using LEGO®. The challenge part comes when it comes documenting the process so others can replicate what you built. This activity is a great icebreaker to get everyone talking about the importance of clear documentation for reproducible workflows.

## Prerequisites
- None

## Learnig Goal
- Illustrate elements of good reproducibility through the medium of LEGO®
- Discuss what is needed and what is not needed for good reproducibility

## Duration
1 hours
